body: Blood, dirt, wine, and more stain this white leather book. The owner's name, Jack Were-son, is stamped into the cover in peeling gold, yet no more information about the author is immediately evident. Several of the pages contain careful diagrams and illustrations done by a competent but uninspiring artist.
name: Manuscript of Jack Were-Son (Level 10 Universalist)
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Spellbooks/Spellbooks/Manuscript of Jack Were-Son (Level 10 Universalist)

sections.body:
5th—break enchantment, mage's private sanctum, polymorph, treasure stitching

4th—charm monster, dimension door, greater invisibility, moonstruck, true form

3rd—cloak of winds, explosive runes, haste, lightning bolt, nondetection, twilight knife

2nd—acid arrow, burning gaze, dust of twilight, fog cloud, metabolize, protection from arrows, spider climb

1st—alter winds, ant haul, burning hands, cause fear, hold portal, identify, magic missile, sleep, stone fist, vanish
sections.name: Spells

sections.body: Average lock with arcane lock (DC 35) and explosive runes (Reflex DC 16)
sections.name: Protection
